title: EXT_implicit_cylinder_region extension on KHR_implicit_shapes.shape
description: Extension of `KHR_implicit_shapes.shape` to represent an implicit cylinder region in a glTF model.

minRadius.description: The inner radius of the cylinder region along the X and Z axes, in meters.

maxRadius.description: The outer radius of the cylinder region along the X and Z axes, in meters.

height.description: The height of the cylinder in meters along the Y-axis, in meters.

minAngle.description: The minimum angle of the cylinder region in radians. In other words, this is the angle where the cylinder region starts. Must be in the range [-pi, pi].

maxAngle.description: The maximum angle of the cylinder region in radians. In other words, this is the angle where the cylinder region ends. Must be in the range [-pi, pi].
